review: It is a nice stick. The downside is the power cord must be plugged in all the time. 10 stars would be given if it was wireless or had rechargeable batteries.
author: carlos

review: I received this for fee when I signed up to Sling. It came in very handy for the season finale of Game of Thrones when my Roku would not load the overloaded HBO website. The Fire Stick on HBO worked and the party I was hosting wasn't ruined. Although the Stick doesn't have all the benefits that a box has, it is more portable so best device while travelling.

review: Good for the price. The channels with sling TV aren't the best but overall the fire stick is great.

review: Works perfectly but has issues. Navigation is jittery some times. Some apps open slow. It takes a lot of time to switch to another app. Overall its a decent buy. I've stopped using my chromecast after buying this.
